name: Deep Resource
description:
Deep Resource is a platformer diving game where you have to dive deeper and deeper into the sea and collect resources, while preventing the aquatic life from any harm.

This game was made for LUDUM DARE 48 Compo.

How to Play :

  • Move the character in the water and prevent damage from red fishes
  • Oxygen levels drop inside water and can be replenished by either coming to the surface or by killing a fish
  • Collect required amount of resources that are spawned randomly in the level
  • Come to surface for next level

Controls : 

  • Arrow keys to move.
  • Space key to attack and collect resources.
  • X key to interact
